data.description: Launch, kill, and list processes by pid.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I thought I'd offer a simple, lightweight, object-oriented, less
    problematic, and less "featured" version of Win32::Process called
    Win32::SimpleProcess. The existing modules are very cumbersome to
    use and often require mixing OOPerl with regular Perl which makes
    for ugly code and in a few places the existing modules are buggy.

    kudos to CPAN

    Ted
